import React, { Component } from 'react'; import './AdminPage.css'; // Import the CSS file class AdminPage extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { modalTitle: '', // Initialize modal title activateAddEditBookComp: false, // Initialize the state for showing/hiding the add/edit component bookList: [], // Initialize the book list (you can fetch data here) book: {} // Initialize the book object for editing }; } // Define the event handlers (addClick, editClick, deleteClick, closeClick) here render() { return (

Hello, Admin!

{/* Button to trigger the modal */} {/* Modal */}
{this.state.modalTitle}
{/* Include the React component for adding/editing books */} {this.state.activateAddEditBookComp && }
{/* Table */} {this.state.bookList.map((dataItem) => ( ))}
Book ID Book Title Author Number of Pages Release Date Options
{dataItem.id_book} {dataItem.book_title} {dataItem.book_author} {dataItem.number_of_pages} {dataItem.release_date_book_year}
); } } export default AdminPage;
